articles.author: Shreyashi Sanyal, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets start year mixed, China stocks open lower as factory activity slumps further - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific markets were mixed at the start of the year, with official data from China over the weekend highlighting a deepening contraction in its manufacturing sector.
articles.content:
Energy stocks may have had a tough year, but Goldman Sachs sees promise in European Big Oil naming integrated oil stocks to play the theme in the new year.
